system.description: Through ecstatic repetition, you may see the face of God. Speak until your tongue dries and rattles to dust, and your body becomes nothing. When you are nothing and the wind takes you, you are in all things, never to be destroyed, only divided, until time's end. – “Lesson Five”, The Six Lessons of Kilo Nueve.
system.effect: Any time you take structure damage, you disappear into a non-space and cease to be a valid target. You reappear in the same space at the start of your next turn. If that space is occupied, you reappear in the nearest available free space (chosen by you).
